item.title: My First Ever Script - High Alcher
item.dc:creator: @Bob_Mrly Bob Mrly
item.description:
@Bob_Mrly wrote:

Very good for a first, but you should consider learning SRL, and you should add more random-ness to it like Mouse(0,0,true+Random(10)), also mess around with bit maps, good luck with your future scripting.

item.title: My First Ever Script - High Alcher
item.dc:creator: @dickiebird dickiebird
item.description:
@dickiebird wrote:

Whenever I high alch, I put the mouse in the right position the click over and over… so this script does it for you!

Its probably awful and uber detectable but it’s the first one I’ve ever written and I had to spend ages reading tutorials :s

Anyway, if you could post feedback and how I could improve and learn more then gratz!

It has no antirandoms or anything as I’ve never done this before!

No colours to set up though

[scar]// First Script By dickiebird //
// Wield Fire Staff And Have Item To Alch In 15th Inventory Space //
// Press Play //

program Alcher;

procedure OpenMagicBook;
begin;
MoveMouseSmooth(735,188);
Wait (50);
ClickMouse(735,188, True);
wait(100+random(200));
end;

procedure HighAlch;
begin
MoveMouseSmoothFrom(735,188, 675,327);
Wait (50);
ClickMouse(675,327, True);
wait(500+random(200));
end;

procedure AlchBow;
begin
ClickMouse(675,327, True);
wait(3000+random(200));
end;

procedure AlchLoop;
begin
ClickMouse(675,327, True);
wait(300+random(200));
end;

begin
OpenMagicBook;
HighAlch;
repeat
AlchBow;
AlchLoop;
until (false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: My First Ever Script - High Alcher
